name: Manipulation Resistance Training
description: Developing a resistance to psychological manipulation, ensuring PSNs cannot reassert control.

cards.title: Immunity to Gaslighting
cards.description: Building an internal framework that prevents gaslighting from taking hold.
bulletpoints: Using reality-checking techniques to prevent the distortion of your perception.
Creating external verification systems to ensure objective truth is maintained.
Countering their manipulation by shifting the burden of proof onto them.

cards.title: Cognitive Reframing for Manipulation Resistance
cards.description: Altering how you process PSN attacks to render them ineffective.
bulletpoints: Recognizing manipulation as a game to detach emotionally from it.
Reframing insults and attacks as reflections of their own insecurity.
Using mental distancing techniques to prevent emotional hijacking.

cards.title: Advanced Boundary Defense
cards.description: Ensuring PSNs cannot breach your personal or professional space.
bulletpoints: Establishing zero-tolerance policies for toxic behaviors.
Using strategic disengagement to prevent PSNs from exploiting conflicts.
Leveraging social and legal measures to keep them at a distance.
